title: Mortgage Plan App
delete_confirmation_prompt: Are you really sure you want to delete this customer?
total_loan_euro: Euro (Example: If the loan is €1500.47, enter 1500)
total_loan_cents: Cents (Example: If the loan is €1500.47, enter 47)
total_loan_euro_valid_range: Total Loan (Euro) must be between 0 and 10,000,000.
total_loan_cents_valid_range: Total Loan (Cents) must be between 0 and 99
